content:
Hi, I'm working with bundles and the aggregation mode for a patient's managingOrganization is set to {b} - code can be found here: https://github.com/hl7dk/dk-medcom-core/blob/master/input/fsh/MedComCorePatient.fsh. When I want to create an example/instance of the patient-profile, while including a managingOrganization I get the following error: Reference is remote which isn't supported by the specified aggregation mode(s) for the reference (bundled).
Does anyone know if there is a way I can work around/avoid this error while keeping the aggregation mode to {b} for the managaingOrganization? Thank you in advance
